$SSFT In my opinion with the market on fire and people pulling money out. I think the OTC market is going to get alot of money flowing back into it. People are going to want value plays I'm truly surprised we didn't hit 4 cents or test 3 cents. Everyone here been waiting a long time I believe there's alot of NDA's with these companies they got contracts with. If SAIBRE proves it has any value then the sky is the limit. I think the silence while it does make me nervous from time to time we are getting close to make it or break it time. Good luck to all the Sonafam there isn't many of us but imagine if $AAPL $GOOGL or $MSFT wants SAIBRE the sky is the limit.

Apple Poised To Outperform Expectations In December Quarter, Analyst Says: How Will Shares React?

The Apple Analyst: Morgan Stanley analyst Katy Huberty has an Overweight rating and a $200 price target for Apple shares. 

Among products, Apple may have shipped 83 million units of iPhones, 7.6 million units of Macs and 14.9 million units of iPads, Huberty said. The analyst estimates total product revenues of $103.1 billion, which is above the consensus estimate of $100.3 billion.

https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/22/01/25140782/apple-poised-to-outperform-expectations-in-december-quarter-analyst-says-how-will-s

links.title: Apple Poised To Outperform Expectations In December Quarter, Analyst Says: How Will Shares React?
links.description: Notwithstanding supply constraints, an analyst at Morgan Stanley is positive about Apple Inc.'s (NASDAQ: AAPL) December quarter performance. The Apple Analyst: Morgan Stanley analyst Katy Huberty has an Overweight rating and a $200 price target for Apple shares.
